text: #COVID19 MA #vaccine website crashed just as 1 million residents became eligible to book an appointment. An irate Gov. Charlie Baker promised “it’s going to get fixed.” Catch my comments w/ @HagerWBZ @wbz #CBSNews on the critical fix . Full segment here - https://t.co/DhH7fKSU6G https://t.co/ofpvCbH8yP
